entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
